snippet.title: Pixel Galaxy - (Xbox One) Trailer | Official Game (2015)
snippet.description:
Pixel Galaxy - (Xbox One) Trailer | Official Game (2015)
Subscribe to Xbox Game TRAILERS ►http://bit.ly/1pMsoAA
Subscribe to Dailymotions Xbox Game TRAILERS ►http://dailymotion.com/XboxViewTV
Like us on FACEBOOK ►http://facebook.com/XboxViewTV
Follow us on TWITTER ►http://twitter.com/XboxViewTV
We are on Google Plus ►https://google.com/+XboxViewTV

Please don't forget to LIKE, SHARE and COMMENT this! THANK YOU!
----------------------------------------
Pixel Galaxy is a shoot ‘em up where you don’t shoot. Instead of fighting enemies, you unite them by collecting them. As you collect them, they form a shield around you and you absorb their abilities. Grow, make friends, and survive together.
----------------------------------------

XboxViewTV PLAYLISTS ► http://goo.gl/QiGmHU
----------------------------------------

Stay up to date with XboxViewTV

Website ►http://www.XboxViewTV.com
----------------------------------------

----------------------------------------

Thanks for all your support, rating this video and leave a comment is always appreciated! Please respect each other in the comments!
